UPDATED:  SEE REPLY BELOW MOVED TO EBAY ALONG WITH 3 OTHERS

For Sale:

Pickering Polar Bear PSA 3  $45
Bill Burns Piedmont  PSA 2  $32
Charlie Starr SC  PSA 3 $34 

All present very nicely for the grade.  Take all 3 for $100.  Paypal f/f preferred  Price includes shipping

Just moved these 3 to Ebay along with 3 others, a Hal Chase, Fred Abbott and Hughie Jennings Portrait (these will go live at 8:00pm tonight).  All starting at .99.  If there is an interest for a "buy it now" on any of the 6 make me an offer and I'll see what we can do.

Here is a link for one of them, just view other items to see other:
